description: A unique integer ID labeling each annotation
The gene identifier, consisting of the the first word of the original FASTA sequence header followed by an underscore followed by the ordinal ID of the protein
The KEGG Orthology group with which the gene was annotated
The adaptive threshold for the bitscore generated using Kofamscan
The bit score generated using Kofamscan which gives a measure of similarity between the gene and the KO family
The number of expected hits of similar quality (score) that could be found just by chance
The GTDB accession of the genome to which the gene belongs
